rule: The response must provide a single category label without any additional text or explanation.
input: Annual Tech Expo showcases innovative technology
output:
Sci/Tech

The article mentions the "Annual Tech Expo" which is indicative of a focus on new and innovative technologies being highlighted or presented. Events like tech expos are typical occurrences within the science and technology category, showcasing advancements and emerging technologies in those fields. Therefore, it is best classified under Sci/Tech.
